alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 10:34PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A band of heavy rain with strong winds will create hazardous driving conditions... A band of heavy rain with embedded thunderstorms will continue moving slowly across eastern Nevada tonight. This storm has been producing hazardous driving conditions, bringing very heavy rain, with reduced visibility of less than 1/2 mile, strong winds, and some local street flooding. There has also been a rain/snow mix above 6000 feet and some hail reported. If encountering these conditions when traveling through 3 am Wednesday morning, please pull over until the storm passes if safe to do so. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
